title: Oil spills - worldwide
summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Oil Spill Event, and Amount of leaked oil (in tons) in each Oil Spill Event on the y axis.
Oil Spill Event Itox Uno (Gulf of Mexico 1979 oil rig) has the highest Amount of leaked oil (in tons) and Erika (Atlantic 1999 tanker) has the lowest Amount of leaked oil (in tons).
Oil Spill Event Erika (Atlantic 1999 tanker) has 50.0 times less Amount of leaked oil (in tons) than Oil Spill Event Itox Uno (Gulf of Mexico 1979 oil rig) which is the highest.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Oil Spill Event in the x axis and Amount of leaked oil (in tons) in the y axis.

The maximum Amount of leaked oil (in tons) 1000000.0 is found at Oil Spill Event Itox Uno (Gulf of Mexico 1979 oil rig) and the minimum is found at Erika (Atlantic 1999 tanker) where Oil Spill Event is 20000.0.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Oil Spill Event, and Amount of leaked oil (in tons) in each Oil Spill Event on the y axis.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Oil Spill Event in the x axis and Amount of leaked oil (in tons) in the y axis.
The Amount of leaked oil (in tons) is appeared to be the highest at Oil Spill Event Itox Uno (Gulf of Mexico 1979 oil rig) and lowest at Oil Spill Event Erika (Atlantic 1999 tanker).
The highest Oil Spill Event Itox Uno (Gulf of Mexico 1979 oil rig) has 980000.0 more Amount of leaked oil (in tons) than the lowest Oil Spill Event Erika (Atlantic 1999 tanker).

The Oil Spill Event Itox Uno (Gulf of Mexico 1979 oil rig) has the highest Amount of leaked oil (in tons), followed by Gulf War (Persian Gulf 1991 oil platform), and Amoco Cadiz (Atlantic 1978 tanker). Down to the Oil Spill Event Erika (Atlantic 1999 tanker) which is the lowest.
Oil Spill Event Itox Uno (Gulf of Mexico 1979 oil rig), and Gulf War (Persian Gulf 1991 oil platform) have the same Amount of leaked oil (in tons).
The Oil Spill Event Erika (Atlantic 1999 tanker) has 3.92 times less Amount of leaked oil (in tons) than average.
Summing up the values of all Oil Spill Events, we get total 3059000.0.
